item.title: Political Consultant Jennifer Gonring Joins SAG-AFTRA Foundation as Chief Strategy Officer
item.description: The strategist, whose namesake firm has worked with major Hollywood figures on political efforts, is going in-house at the nonprofit as she launches a new consulting company.
